DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : TAIWAN
DOC.TEXT: Central_Bank Liberalizes Money Transfers : Taiwan ' s central_bank said it will allow non-resident foreign individuals and institutions to freely transfer up_to $ 100 # 000 in or out of the country . The move is in_line with bank efforts to liberalize foreign_exchange rules and expand growth in local banks ' foreign_exchange business , the Central_Bank of China said in a statement .
